name: In Still of Night (LITE) - Block Puzzle
name_original: In Still of Night (LITE) - Block Puzzle
description:
In Still of Night (LITE) - A Relaxing, Thought-Provoking Puzzle Game

Interact with a unique cast of blocks in a strange, fantastic world!

Addictive and easy to pick up! A puzzle game for everyone!
*The LITE version includes a sample 10 out of 50 levels.

Easy to play anywhere on the the go! No time limits; play at your own pace!

Try to complete all 50 levels at 5 different difficulties!
*The LITE version includes 10 levels.

How-to:

Easy to play! Slide blocks from side to side to drop them.
Chain three or more of the same color to make them disappear.
Clear all the blocks to complete the level!
